description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he focuses on transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa brings people together around common values, translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work spans topics like decentralization, digital landscapes, waste economy, and internet culture. He explores concepts such as ecosystem architecture, fragmentation, and regenerative design, applying philosophical ideas to modern technological challenges.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends philosophy and tech to transform education and knowledge sharing. His work explores decentralization, digital landscapes, and regenerative design, applying philosophical concepts to modern tech challenges.
